why are you so legend Q_Q
I am a Legend of Dragoon.
Thank you for that subtle reminder that Dragoons were removed from Starcraft.

protoss, while still my favorite race, are the underdogs for sure now. stalkers are nowhere near as good, and immortals can't hit air. Carriers have been nerfed hard. WHY IS PROTOSS HATED BY BLIZZARD?!!?

I'm just hoping for some redeeming qualities in Legacy of the Void, because currently the new units are stupid IMO.
Ok, not stupid, but relatively weak. Terran gets more awesome stuff, zerg gets lurker back and a cool roach upgrade(that acts like a marauder does for protoss shield destruction!), and protoss gets meh.

It saddens me greatly that people don't get this reference. :(

[Legend of Dragoon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Legend_of_Dragoon) people, amazing skill based RPG with a great story and a lot of beautiful hand drawn visuals.  The Light Dragoon was one of the game's titular dragoon characters, though technically she was called the White Silver Dragoon.
I'll be honest, my name was supposed to be based of the Lightning Dragoon.

did you continue those since the one with Cassiopeia?
Of course.
Could you, by any chance, make a thread with links to all of it?

Legends Of The Dragoon?
My childhood in a nutshell.

I actually played with him in a game once. We randomly found each other in team builder and he was playing Quinn. Of course I had to make really bad plays and look like a bronze 11 noob. {{item:3070}} {{champion:18}} {{item:3070}}
Rock you llke a hurricane
Guess it was a one hit wonder.

{{champion:81}} "Heh, all he got was a rock."
{{champion:72}} "The planet is one rock."
The rock thing is stupid.  If his power is gated by it, Skarner is trash unless he's near it.  Instead they decide to let him keep all his power and gave him the buff rock.
it was only if he cc'd someone so... by stunning with E or ulting someone.
The ol' Charlie Brown effect

https://funland5000.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/rock.jpg

I'll just leave this here.

It was riot's way of putting the boards in their place.

You think this rework is gonna make him worse? Eat this ya lil shits

But he is worse. Yes, he functions and is very successful in games, but his actual design is worse because now his current... idea I guess, is that he is a ball of stats champion that has six balls that give him more stats.

Honestly, think about what Skarner will be like when his numbers are tuned right so that he isn't OP. Is there any reason to play him over someone else? The only thing unique he provides is still the same thing as always, his ult.

Well, I guess Riot is sorta trying to theme him more to a neutral objective controller. I think people would play him over someone else because its kind of like a mini-game: You fight in this area and yay! You win(sometimes). His ult _is_ the most unique thing about him, however this makes him more unique; and possibly more fun to play.

The issue is that even as a neutral objective controller he's not great,  he's not good at controlling those objectives because his kit inherently make him good at it like Nunu's Consume for the monsters themselves ,or Fiddle's ability to ult onto an unsuspecting team. Instead his ability to control neutral objectives is because of a ham fisted stat boost.

It doesn't make him any better at controlling these areas because they give him a unique skill or ability that lends itself to this (Like... what if the range of summoner spells was increased for him when he's near a rock? Then he could smite from over a wall if his crystal isn't captured) it's just "I function better here because reasons."

I think that the idea is that he's meant to be just okay when he's not around his rock, and fantastic when he is. I feel that now that he's less "I hope I can charge out of the jungle at 550 movespeed and smack you around, if not I'm useless" and more "No matter what, I have the potential to get my rock. This rock is my friend, my buddy. Rock on." etc, he will be allowed to be a bit stronger.

It's not even the crystals alone that make him oppressive. It's fighting him with the double stun, low cooldown rapid slashing, when he has thornmail, 1 or more juggernaut items and overall heavy defense which boosts his shield that's soul sucking. Good luck if he so happens to have triforce.
+1 gordon
I mean, yeah sure, he's strong, but... I dunno, I just find him less fun.
he is almost the same tbh

Same with Mordekaiser

only except he gets a DRAGON

also, that was 2 replies, some haters.
http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f327/mega92/feelbadman.jpg
Actually I was always afraid of him inside those fields. I was more afraid of how sad he would be outside of those fields. But then I solo'd dragon lvl 5 and all was K.

That's why I ignored everyone who didn't even test the juggernauts on PBE, and even those saying "so and so is trash now". 

Darius did NOT need that hotfix buff either. Just like reworked Ryze didn't need buffs just because his release week winrate was in the shitters. 

I wish people would get adjusted and recognize a hero's strengths before spouting off like they know what they're talking about. 

Side note: I'm tired of the same two "Morde mains, even though one of them got exposed for buying an account and doing horribly on Morde" constantly making threads as if they're the authority on Morde just because they named their accounts after him, and the blind upvotes they get for having cool names. Those guys, unsurprisingly, didn't know squat and it turns out Morde doesn't suffer bot lane at all. "QQ huehue CertainlyT gonna fail"

zzzz
